DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate pharmacokinetic profile ( i.e . way product process body ) proprietary curcumin formulation compare unformulated curcumin product . Subjects take single dose either proprietary formulation comparator product blood level curcumin curcumin metabolite measure period 48 hour .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetic Profile Proprietary Curcumin Forumulation Comparator Curcumin Product
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female 1845 year age 2 . If female , subject child bear potential , defined female hysterectomy oophorectomy , bilateral tubal ligation postmenopausal ( natural surgically > 1 year since last menstruation ) OR Females childbearing potential must agree use medically approve method birth control negative urine pregnancy test result . Acceptable method birth control include : Hormonal contraceptive include oral contraceptive , hormone birth control patch ( Ortho Evra ) , vaginal contraceptive ring ( NuvaRing ) , injectable contraceptive ( DepoProvera , Lunelle ) , hormone implant ( Norplant System ) Doublebarrier method Nonhormonal intrauterine device Vasectomy partner 3 . BMI 1829.9 kg/m2 ( ±1 kg/m2 ) 4 . Healthy determine laboratory result medical history 5 . Agrees maintain current level physical activity throughout study 6 . Agree avoid use black white pepper , turmeric , curcumin curry preparation food 7 day prior randomization throughout study period . 7 . Agree avoid Indian Thai cuisine period study 8 . Agree avoid food yellow dye # E100 9 . Agrees avoid alcohol , caffeine 12 hour grapefruit grapefruit juice 48 hour prior baseline subsequent clinic visit 10 . Agrees consume low polyphenols diet ( nutritionists counsel high polyphenol fruit , vegetable avoid , wine , beer , supplement , herbal extract , wholegrain base food ) 3 day prior baseline test day ( meal option list food avoid provide subject nutritionist ) 11 . Has give voluntary , write , inform consent participate study 1 . BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 2 . Women pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant course trial . 3 . Unstable medical condition determine Qualified Investigator 4 . Use natural health product contain turmeric curcumin within 7 day prior randomization course study 5 . Use St Johns Wort 3 week prior baseline study 6 . Subjects smokers 7 . Subjects current history gastrointestinal problem disease 8 . Metabolic , endocrine , chronic disease 9 . Immunocompromised individual subject undergo organ transplantation subject diagnose human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) 10 . Clinically significant abnormal lab result screen ( e.g . AST and/or ALT > 2 x ULN , and/or bilirubin > 2 x ULN ) assess Qualified Investigator 11 . Subjects plan surgery course trial 12 . History current diagnosis cancer ( except successfully treat basal cell carcinoma ) diagnose less 5 year prior screen . Subjects cancer full remission 5 year diagnosis acceptable . 13 . History gallbladder issue , hyperacidity , gastric/duodenal ulcer . 14 . Prior use prescription H2 blocker , proton pump inhibitor blood sugarlowering agent 15 . Use blood pressure medication 16 . Subjects restrictive dietary regimen 17 . Blood donation last 2 month 18 . History blood/bleeding disorder take prescription blood thinner antiplatelet therapy 19 . Alcohol abuse ( > 2 standard alcoholic drink per day ) drug abuse within past 6 month 20 . Use medical marijuana 21 . Clinically significant abnormal laboratory result screen 22 . Participation clinical research trial within 30 day prior randomization 23 . Allergy sensitivity study supplement ingredient food beverage provide study 24 . Individuals cognitively impair and/or unable give inform consent 25 . Any condition Investigator 's opinion may adversely affect subject 's ability complete study measure may pose significant risk subject
